metadata_csv.contract_id: Unique Kalshi market ticker (from input CSV)
metadata_csv.pm_category: Our internal project category (from input CSV)
metadata_csv.event_ticker: Ticker for the parent event (from API)
metadata_csv.title: Human-readable market title (from API)
metadata_csv.category: Kalshi's API category for the market (from API)
metadata_csv.volume: Total contracts traded (snapshot at time of pull) (from API)
metadata_csv.open_interest: Total open contracts (snapshot at time of pull) (from API)
metadata_csv.last_price: Last traded price (snapshot at time of pull) (from API)
metadata_csv.resolution_rule: The primary rule text for market settlement (from API)

timeseries_csv.price_c: Closing trade price (This is the 'last_price' for the interval)
timeseries_csv.volume: Total contracts traded in the 1-min interval
timeseries_csv.trade_count: Number of distinct trades in the 1-min interval
